text: kapati purusaru mattu kapati striyaru paraspara tumba aptaru. Avaru kedukannu adesisuttare mattu olitininda tadeyuttare. Hageye avaru tam'ma kaigalannu kattiruttare (tira jipunaragiruttare). Avaru allahanannu maretiddare mattu allahanu avarannu maretiddane. Khanditavagiyu kapatigale nijavada avidheyaragiddare
